Description: Handle sliver of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp with ribboned thyrsos symbol. Clay fine light red-brown; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 185, 18). Name Polemon.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1033)
